name: @azure-rest/communication-job-router
author: Microsoft Corporation
description: Azure client library for Azure Communication Job Router services

scripts.build: npm run clean && dev-tool run build-package && dev-tool run extract-api
scripts.build:browser: dev-tool run build-package && dev-tool run vendored cross-env ONLY_BROWSER=true rollup -c 2>&1
scripts.build:debug: dev-tool run build-package && dev-tool run bundle && dev-tool run extract-api
scripts.build:node: dev-tool run build-package && dev-tool run vendored cross-env ONLY_NODE=true rollup -c 2>&1
scripts.build:test: dev-tool run build-package && dev-tool run bundle
scripts.clean: dev-tool run vendored rimraf --glob dist dist-browser dist-esm test-dist temp types *.tgz *.log
scripts.extract-api: dev-tool run vendored rimraf review && dev-tool run extract-api
scripts.integration-test: npm run integration-test:node && npm run integration-test:browser
scripts.integration-test:browser: npm run clean && dev-tool run build-package && dev-tool run build-test && dev-tool run test:vitest --browser
scripts.test: npm rdddun clean && npm run build:test && npm run unit-test
scripts.test:browser: npm run clean && npm run build:test && npm run unit-test:browser
scripts.test:node: npm run clean && npm run build:test && npm run unit-test:node
scripts.unit-test: npm run unit-test:node && npm run unit-test:browser
scripts.unit-test:browser: npm run clean && dev-tool run build-package && dev-tool run build-test && dev-tool run test:vitest --browser

//sampleConfiguration.productName: Azure client library for Azure Communication Job Router services
